title: Share Your Listings with the World
homepage_description: Here, users can share their various listings worldwide and gain new opportunities. A perfect marketplace for everyone.
connectWithPeople: Connect with people from around the world and share your experiences, announcements, and news. Our platform helps you reach a global audience in a seamless and interactive way.
missionDescription: Our platform is designed to empower individuals from all corners of the world to freely share their thoughts, ideas, and announcements with a global audience. Whether you're sharing a personal story, promoting a business, or announcing an event, our goal is to provide a space where your voice can be heard.
globalReachDescription: Share your announcements with a global audience, connect with people across borders, and create meaningful interactions.
easyToUseDescription: Our platform is designed to be user-friendly, allowing anyone to create, share, and manage their announcements effortlessly.
interactiveFeaturesDescription: Engage with others through comments, likes, and direct messaging, ensuring that every announcement can spark meaningful conversations.
visionDescription: We aim to be the world's leading platform for sharing announcements, building communities, and fostering global conversations. Our vision is to create an inclusive space where individuals from all backgrounds can express themselves, find connections, and make their voices heard.
callToActionDescription: Whether you're looking to promote your business, share an important event, or simply connect with others, our platform provides you with the tools you need to make an impact.
successMessage: Your message has been successfully sent!
errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again.
settingsfillAllFields: Please fill in all fields (except for the picture).
settingsprofileUpdateError: An error occurred while updating the profile:
settingsfillInAllFields: Please fill in all fields and save your profile.
inboxerrorText: Text or user ID not found
noSavedAds: You don't have any saved ads.
carddetailsyourbrowserdoesnotsupportvide: Your browser does not support the video tag.
